channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump admin updates: Hegseth says he did not see 2nd boat strike, survivors
item.description: Hegseth said he saw the first attack, but didn't "stick around" for the second.

item.title: Man accused of swallowing $19,000 pendant inspired by Bond movie
item.description: The alleged loot was a limited-edition, Fabergé egg pendant inspired by the 1983 James Bond film Octopussy.

item.title: Trump targets Minnesota’s Somali community with harsh words and policies
Family of fisherman killed in US boat strike files complaint alleging he was murdered
item.description: The filing comes after Colombian President Gustavo Petro accused the U.S. government of committing murder for the Sept. 15 strike that killed the fish...

item.title: 12/2: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth doubles down on strikes on alleged drug boats, saying they have "only just begun;" New book exposes China's state-run e...

item.title: 10/29: CBS Morning News
item.description: Hurricane Melissa moves into Cuba as Jamaica surveys catastrophic damage; Microsoft and OpenAI announce a restructuring deal.

item.title: India revokes order for phone makers to install security app amid uproar
item.description: India's government, amid an uproar over privacy, has revoked an order quietly issued to smartphone makers to pre-install a state-run security app.

item.title: Duckworth demands DOT give $10K bonus to all air traffic controllers, FAA techs
item.description: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said that the bonus would be given only to controllers and technicians who didn't miss a shift during the shutdown...

item.title: A 1-year-old was among 159 killed in Hong Kong apartment fires. 30 others missing
item.description: The death toll from a high-rise apartment fire in Hong Kong has risen to 159

item.title: Trump-backed Republican Matt Van Epps wins US House special election in Tennessee
Federal authorities plan operation in Minnesota focusing on Somali immigrants, AP source says
item.description: Federal authorities are preparing an immigration enforcement operation in Minnesota, focusing on Somali immigrants living unlawfully in the U.S.

item.title: WATCH: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth: 'We've only just begun' striking alleged drug boats
item.description: During Tuesday's Trump cabinet meeting, Hegseth said that "we've only just begun" striking alleged drug boats, adding that narco-terrorists will be pu...

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
